review: Strongly reccommend this game to anyone who enjoys clever puzzles, although a little under 3 hours, the game has replay value as there are different endings and plenty of small choices for all you chieve hunters out there. FANTASTIC soundtrack, accompanied with believable yet expressive characters, it's packed with clever humour, and leaves you with a noir-ish feel in your soul. I definitely reccommend this game for anyone who has a spare couple of hours.
